title: Will iPhone ever use under-display Touch ID? Kuo isn’t so sure now
content:
After predicting the iPhone 15 could feature under-display Touch ID, Apple analyst Ming-Chi Kuo now says a latest survey indicates neither the 2023 nor the 2024 iPhone may adopt this technology, as Apple could be satisfied with its software solutions and new technologies.

more…

The post Will iPhone ever use under-display Touch ID? Kuo isn’t so sure now appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: After predicting the iPhone 15 could feature under-display Touch ID, Apple analyst Ming-Chi Kuo isn't so sure anymore.
